Document:
# LAWNDART-CLASS PERSONAL SHUTTLE
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Small (Micro)
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 1-2
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] Welding Fuel
[color=#a4885c]Expeditions:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] None
"Minimalistic Ship that runs on Welding Fuel, no accidents since last shift. Bring your own Canister."
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply ## 1.1 J.R.P.A.C.M.A.N.
- Check that the J.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator is anchored to the floor. - Check that the J.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator has fuel. - Set Target Power for 4 [bold]kW[/bold]. - Start the P.A.C.M.A.N. generator.
## 1.2 Fuel
- Fuel for ca. 40 minutes of sustained flight is provided.* - WARNING: Flameable! - WARNING: Toxic!
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the air canister is anchored to connector port.**
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Ensure air alarm is set to filtering.
## Sidenotes
- * J.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. may need refueling mid-flight. - ** Air canister not provided - Disclaimer: Exchanging generator for a model of higher power requires additional hardware not provided.
